title: QuickText Add On
content:
Hi,

I'd like to ask how I'd get the older version of Thunderbird that uses the Quicktext addon. I currently use the version 140.0.1 and no Quicktext add on is compatible with this. Can anyone help? This feature is the reason I use Thunderbird.

Thank you.

title: Changing the # of days to retain messages in account settings/disk space
content:
When I try to change the number of days messages are kept in my inbox (from the default of 30), I get a pop-up window warning me that this will permanently delete the messages and do I want to proceed (see screenshot).

While that pop-up window is up, I can't increase the # of days to retain messages. May I press "OK" and then adjust the number of days messages are retained? Or, if I press "OK" will that immediately delete all messages older than 30 days?

Thanks!
creator: shawnsites

title: version problem

title: Thunderbird
content: Hi, perhaps my problem is not that unusual, but I'm finding it a bit difficult to solve. I have three email accounts on Thunderbird, and all of them have exactly the same specifications. They are all @hotmail.com. They have the same server name (outlook.office365.com), same port number, same connection security, same authentication method (0Auth2) and same Imap default release code. Never had a problem. Then on July 10th just one of them stopped opening and a message window appeared saying that authentication was OK but it wasn't able to connect. The other two continue to open as before. Any idea on how to rectify this, please.
creator: johnsweetensen

title: Thunderbird dan webmail tidak sama email masuknya

title: E-mail verzenden mislukt
content: Sinds gisteren lukt het versturen van e-mail niet meer. Krijg de volgende tekst te zien: Verzenden van bericht is mislukt. Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van e-mail. De mail server antwoordde: Unable te relay without authentication. Controleer of uw e-mailadres juist isingesteld in uw accountinstellingen en probeer het opnieuw. E-mail adres staat juist vermeld in accountinstellingen. Probleem te maken met recente update? Hoe kom ik van dit probleem af?

title: the 'go' button in Thunderbird

When TB was put on this new computer, it doesn't have the 'go' button, and the techies can't find it, and I can't even find any information on it. HELP!!

title: Phone Number Not Displaying on Google Maps – Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi
content:
Dear Google Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue regarding my business listing for Rama Rehab (website: https://www.ramarehab.com). Despite being listed as a Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, my official contact phone number is currently not appearing on Google Maps.

This issue is impacting our ability to serve patients and families seeking reliable rehabilitation services in Delhi. Many individuals rely on our contact details to reach out for help, and the absence of our phone number is causing serious inconvenience.

Please look into this matter as soon as possible and help in updating or restoring our correct contact number on Google Maps.

Thank you for your support and cooperation.

Best regards, Rama Rehab Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi Website: https://www.ramarehab.com
creator: roarwellnessrama

title: NEW PASSWORD
